jobTitle.title: a founder and CEO Modern Day Essentailz
a founder and CEO Equity Investment Partners

about: Greetings! I'm Carl James, a dedicated aspiring developer currently honing my skills in web development at Life Choices Academy. Prior to my time here, I spent three years residing in America. My enthusiasm lies in the realm of design, and I find joy in tackling challenges. Continuously seeking opportunities to enhance my capabilities, I invest my time in upskilling myself. Beyond the realm of work, I am deeply engaged in nurturing my own business venture. Outside of the professional sphere, my passions extend to exploring new places and savoring diverse cuisines, allowing me to appreciate various cultures.

education.description: Started Studying Web Development and Coding
Worked in various restaurant and country clubs was on a work visa
Learnt how to promote various items

skills.title: Css
skills.experience: I have a decade of experience in web development using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JQuery, and Javascript. I am still building applications using the mentioned technologies.

skills.title: Git
skills.experience: I've have been working on different types of databases since 2009, both SQL-structured and document-based. I enjoy working on a database; for me, that is where the magic happens. A well-structured database is the result of data integrity and many more.

skills.title: Html
skills.experience: In case we want to secure, identify, and authorize access to a user on a specific resource, we need to have an API, which is a glue between the front end and back end. We can set up a lot of features or logic, such as middleware, database configuration, JSON web tokens, and many more. For the past 7 years, I have been working on APIs using Django and ExpressJS.

skills.title: Bootstrap
skills.experience: When it comes to programming, I have a lot to say, but I will be brief. Programming and database management are the skills that will stay with me forever, even though it is my first time to come across another programming language. It is crazy how I knew it syntax before starting coding. I have a decade of working experience on the following programming languages: C++, Python, Delphi, Javascript, VB.Net, C#, and Java. I still want to learn more about them.

testimonials.name: Thimna
testimonials.quotes: Carl is the most grounded, well mannered and focused person I have ever met. He is one to fixate on a problem until it is perfectly done in other words he leaves no room for error. One skill that mostly possesses is self discipline and at that he also knows how to lead others. If there is one thing I admire about him is that if you go ask him for help if he doesn't know he will tell you but to your surprise he will make it his mission to go do research and come back to you with a solution. Among all of those amazing characteristics he is a respectful person who sees value in each person and everything.

testimonials.name: Veronique
testimonials.quotes: Mr James, my testamonial: Carl has demonstrated many of the skills required to be a great developer. He is meticulous and pays attention to detail when it comes to his work on a small and larger scale. He is incredibly efficient at managing his time and works hard at every task his given. Other than technical skills he is effective at communicating and shows great skills for leadership too. In addition, he is always willing to help his colleagues and will be a great asset to any company and team he is a part of

testimonials.name: Tamlin
testimonials.quotes: Carl's dedication to his craft is nothing short of commendable. Despite his free-spirited nature, he demonstrates an unwavering commitment to his work, consistently delivering exceptional results. His ability to balance the demands of coding and personal life is truly remarkable, showcasing a level of professionalism that is both rare and inspiring. As a full-stack developer, Carl exhibits a remarkable proficiency in both front-end and back-end technologies. His coding skills are not only technically sound but also reflect a balanced and thoughtful approach to problem-solving. Carl's projects consistently showcase a harmonious blend of creativity and precision, a testament to his proficiency as a well-rounded developer. In addition to his focused approach to coding, Carl is known for his willingness to assist others. He generously shares his knowledge and expertise, proving to be an invaluable asset to colleagues and peers alike. Carl's helpful and collaborative nature creates a positive working environment, fostering a sense of camaraderie among team members.

testimonials.name: Sivuyisiwe
testimonials.quotes: I am thrilled to share my heartfelt testimonial for Carl, a remarkable colleague. His expertise in HTML, CSS, Vue.js, JavaScript, and  is truly impressive, and he effortlessly demonstrates adequate proficiency in these technologies. However, what truly sets Carl apart is his exceptional adapting skills.  I consider myself fortunate to have learned from him, and I wholeheartedly recommend him as an outstanding colleague.

testimonials.name: Aakeefah
testimonials.quotes: Working with Carl James was awesome! He really knows his stuff when it comes to web development. Super chill and easy to communicate with. I'd definitely team up with him again!

testimonials.name: Pinda
testimonials.quotes: I am thrilled to share my heartfelt testimonial for Joel, a remarkable former co-worker and lecturer. Joel worked under my guidance for one year during my time as Head of Curriculum and Learning at Lifechoices Academy. His expertise in C++, HTML, CSS, Vue.js, JavaScript, and Node.js is truly impressive, and he effortlessly demonstrates proficiency in these technologies. However, what truly sets Joel apart is his exceptional teaching skills. He has a natural talent for breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible bits, making the learning process enjoyable and engaging. Joel's patience and willingness to go the extra mile to ensure every student grasps the material are truly commendable. I consider myself fortunate to have learned from him, and I wholeheartedly recommend him as an outstanding educator.
